featured.text: In 1790, President George Washington declared that the federal government would reside in a district “not exceeding ten miles square … on the river Potomac.”

definition.zh_def: 聯邦的；與聯邦政府有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to a system of government in which power is divided between a central authority and constituent political units.
definition.example: The federal government is responsible for national defense.
